CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( OtherPhone ) , ISBLANK( FirstName ), Is_Default_First_Name__c, Is_Default_Other_Phone__c ) , null, SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(OtherPhone, "+", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "-", ""), " ",""), ".",""), "/","")& FirstName)
CustomField.label: PF 2
